data.price: Kuma waɗanda suke cẽwa "Ya Ubangijinmu! Ka karkatar da azãbar Jahannama daga gare mu. Lalle ne, azãbarta tã zama tãra*
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا ٱصۡرِفۡ عَنَّا عَذَابَ جَهَنَّمَۖ إِنَّ عَذَابَهَا كَانَ غَرَامًا
data.footnotes: * Garama, ita ce uƙũba da dũkiya mai lazimtar wanda aka aza wa ita. Da Hausa anã cewa tãra. Watau azãba da zã tafi ƙarfin jiki har tanã neman wani abu wanda ya danganci jiki. Kõ mene ne, kamar dũkiya.

data.price: "Lalle ne ita ta mũnana ta zama wurin tabbata da mazauni."

dua.name: Dua for Guidance in Confusion
dua.significanceReason: Seeks divine guidance during periods of spiritual and personal confusion, asking for clarity and illumination of the path.
